DPU_DopplerProcDSP_StaticConfig_t Struct Reference
dopplerProc DPU External Data Structures

Doppler DPU static configuration parameters. More...

#include <dpu/dopplerproc/dopplerprocdsp.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t numTxAntennas
 Number of transmit antennas.
 
uint8_t numRxAntennas
 Number of receive antennas.
 
uint8_t numVirtualAntennas
 Number of virtual antennas.
 
uint16_t numRangeBins
 Number of range bins.
 
uint16_t numDopplerChirps
 Number of Doppler chirps. Must be a multiple of 4.
 
uint16_t numDopplerBins
 Number of Doppler bins.
 
uint8_t log2NumDopplerBins
 Log2 of number of Doppler bins.
 
bool isBpmEnabled
 Flag that indicates if BPM is enabled. BPM can only be enabled/disabled during configuration time.
 

Detailed Description

Doppler DPU static configuration parameters.

The structure is used to hold the static configuration parameters
